sourcesContent:
<template>
  <header-vue></header-vue>
  <router-view/>
  <footer-vue></footer-vue>
</template>
<script>
import HeaderVue from './components/Header.vue'
import FooterVue from './components/Footer.vue'
export default{
    name: 'App',
    components: {
        HeaderVue,
        FooterVue
    }
}
</script>
<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  /* text-align: center; */
  color: #2c3e50;
}

body{
    font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

header{
    width: 100%;
    height: 140px;
    /* margin-bottom: 25px; */
}

#encabezado{
    width: 100%;
    height: 72px;
    background-color: #fff;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center; 
    justify-content: flex-start;   
}

.logo{
    width: auto;
    height: 72px;
    display: flex;
}

.logo img{
    height: 70px;
}

.titulo{
    width: auto;
    height: 70px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    letter-spacing: 0px;
}

.titulo span{
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: 400;
}

nav{
    width: 100%;
    height: 50px;
    background: #008645;
}

nav li{
    list-style: none;
    margin-left: 25px;
}

footer{
    width: 100%;
    height: 25px;
    background: #008645;
    margin-top: 25px;
}
</style>
